content: these are fun and easy halloween mitts that you can crochet in no time please treat this not as a strict pattern but as an initial idea that is very easy to modify to fit any color size or taste gauge is not very important just change the number of stitches in the bracelet to fit your wrist and adjust the number of rounds in the web update 10/23/2011 i am happy to see that this simple pattern becomes an inspiration for others please check an awesome spider web vest from angelsunawares 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/web-vest 1 http //www ravelry com/people/angelsunawares
